pages.text: $(li)Finally! You already have all the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/ender_eyes)Ender Eyes$(/l).$(br)$(li)Now your objetive is to find the $(l)End Portal$().$(br)$(li)Throw an Ender Eye right clicking while it is in your hand.$(br)$(li)It will float for a few seconds in the direction of the End portal.
$(li)Don't lose it!$(br)$(li)Repeat this process until find the End Portal.
